alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Garfield; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 23 at 2:26PM MDT until April 24 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Garfield, Daniels, Western Roosevelt and Central and Southern Valley Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Boating on Fort Peck Lake will be hazardous. Strong winds and high waves will make boating difficult. Cold water will lead to quick hypothermia. Extreme stress on newborn and young livestock expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Garfield; Western Roosevelt
